description: Writers and Artists in Residence „Marko Marulić“ by Udruga Kurs is a residency program that provides writers and artists with the opportunity to live and work in Split, fostering creativity and cultural exchange.

Title: Šesnaesti Festival pričanja priča "Pričigin"
shortDescription: The 16th Storytelling Festival "Pričigin" by Udruga Pričigin.
description: Šesnaesti Festival Pričanja Priča "Pričigin" by Udruga Pričigin is the 16th edition of the storytelling festival, celebrating the art of storytelling through various events and performances.

Title: Bruce Marshall: Čuda oca Malahije
shortDescription: A book titled 'Čuda oca Malahije' by Bruce Marshall, published by Verbum d.o.o.
description: Čuda Oca Malahije by Bruce Marshall, published by Verbum d.o.o, is a captivating book that explores themes of faith, miracles, and human nature.

Title: Aleksander Schmemann: Za život svijeta
shortDescription: A book titled 'Za život svijeta' by Aleksander Schmemann, published by Verbum d.o.o.
description: Za Život Svijeta by Aleksander Schmemann, published by Verbum d.o.o, is a thought-provoking book that delves into the significance of liturgy and its role in the Christian life.

Title: 16. Festival mediteranskog filma Split
shortDescription: The 16th Mediterranean Film Festival Split by FMFS.
description: The 16. Festival Mediteranskog Filma Split by FMFS is an annual event celebrating Mediterranean cinema, featuring a diverse selection of films, workshops, and panel discussions.

Title: Nezavisni na Bačvicama
shortDescription: Independent films at Bačvice by FMFS.
description: Nezavisni na Bačvicama by FMFS showcases independent films at the scenic Bačvice beach, providing a unique viewing experience and supporting indie filmmakers.

Title: Filmski market Split / Industrija 1.0
shortDescription: Film market and industry event in Split by FMFS.
description: Filmski Market Split / Industrija 1.0 by FMFS is a film market and industry event that connects filmmakers, producers, and distributors, fostering networking and collaboration.

Title: Sola, kratkometražni igrani film red. Lana Barić
shortDescription: A short feature film 'Sola' directed by Lana Barić by Focus Media d.o.o.
description: Sola, a short feature film directed by Lana Barić, is a poignant narrative that explores themes of identity and personal struggle, produced by Focus Media d.o.o.

Title: Kino Klub Split 2023
shortDescription: Kino Klub Split's program for 2023.
description: Kino Klub Split 2023 by Kino Klub Split offers a comprehensive program of film screenings, workshops, and events aimed at promoting cinematic arts and education.

Title: Edukativni program Kino kluba Split 2023
shortDescription: Educational program by Kino Klub Split for 2023.
description: Edukativni Program Kino Kluba Split 2023 by Kino Klub Split includes a series of educational initiatives designed to teach filmmaking techniques and theory to aspiring filmmakers.

Title: Skriveni grad – multimedijalni projekt u području arhitekture, urbanizma i audiovizualnih medija
shortDescription: A multimedia project on architecture, urbanism, and audiovisual media by Kino klub Split.
description: Skriveni Grad by Kino Klub Split is a multimedia project that explores the intersections of architecture, urbanism, and audiovisual media, aiming to provide new perspectives on urban spaces.

Title: Ispod bine
shortDescription: An artistic project titled 'Ispod bine' by Mavena.
description: Ispod Bine by Mavena is an artistic project that delves into the behind-the-scenes aspects of theater production, revealing the hidden dynamics of stage performance.

Title: 6. Split Script
shortDescription: The 6th Split Script event by Metonimija.
description: 6. Split Script by Metonimija is an event focused on screenwriting, offering workshops, panel discussions, and networking opportunities for writers and filmmakers.

Title: Dalmatia Film Festival
shortDescription: The Dalmatia Film Festival by Moonstone Production d.o.o.
description: Dalmatia Film Festival by Moonstone Production d.o.o. is an annual film festival showcasing regional and international films, promoting cultural exchange and cinematic arts.

Title: Mala škola filma
shortDescription: A film school for children by Moonstone Production d.o.o.
description: Mala Škola Filma by Moonstone Production d.o.o. is an educational program that introduces children to the basics of filmmaking, fostering creativity and technical skills in young participants.

Title: Split Film Festival
shortDescription: The annual Split Film Festival.
description: Split Film Festival is a renowned event that features a diverse selection of films from around the world, celebrating independent and experimental cinema.

Title: Ja se zovem Did Jozo, igrani, red. Antonija Šitum
shortDescription: A feature film 'Ja se zovem Did Jozo' directed by Antonija Šitum by Udruga Blank.
description: Ja se Zovem Did Jozo is a feature film directed by Antonija Šitum and produced by Udruga Blank, telling a compelling story about identity and family heritage.

Title: Poluotok, doku kratki red. Paula Skelin
shortDescription: A documentary short 'Poluotok' directed by Paula Skelin by Udruga Blank.
description: Poluotok is a documentary short film directed by Paula Skelin, produced by Udruga Blank, exploring the unique cultural and social aspects of a peninsula community.

Title: Fantastikon
shortDescription: Fantastikon event by Udruga F&ST.
description: Fantastikon by Udruga F&ST is a festival dedicated to fantasy, science fiction, and horror genres, featuring film screenings, panel discussions, and cosplay events.

Title: Momentić - Pop-up kino i projekcije kratkih filmova
shortDescription: Pop-up cinema and short film screenings by Udruga Momentum.
description: Momentić by Udruga Momentum is a pop-up cinema event that showcases short films, providing a platform for emerging filmmakers to present their work to a broader audience.

Title: Revija UMAS 2023
shortDescription: UMAS 2023 Review by UMAS.
description: Revija UMAS 2023 is an annual review by UMAS, featuring the works of students from the Academy of Arts, showcasing their achievements in various fields of art and design.

Title: „Traje veliko finale“, kratkometražni igrani film red. Luka Galešić
shortDescription: A short feature film 'Traje veliko finale' directed by Luka Galešić by Digital Cinema Environment.
description: „Traje Veliko Finale“ is a short feature film directed by Luka Galešić and produced by Digital Cinema Environment, offering a gripping narrative that captivates the audience.
